description: Whether you live in the Netherlands or make use of the Dutch railway system during your stay in the Netherlands, this app will provide you with up to date information regarding live departure times, delays, construction work and more.  IMPORTANT: If you are using a version of this app prior to version 1.0.5, please remove it before installing this version.  Version 1.0.7 - Remove BETA check from app  Version 1.0.6 - Bug fix for the disruptions/storingen screen  Version 1.0.5 - General UI changes/enhancements - Updated app to work with changes made to the mobiel.ns.nl site - General bug fix release  Version 1.0.4 - Minor bug fix relating to network presence check  Version 1.0.3 - Updated the main page with a new background  Version 1.0.2 - Bug fix (tap on journey advice page sometimes would not work was related to delayed trains)  Version 1.0.1 - Fixed some bugs - Updated spinners - Updated network checking - Added home and about to the app menu Initial release  Version 1.0.0 Features include: - Dutch and English language support - Journey planner - Live departure times for your favorite station on the home page - Check live departure times for a specific station - Railway construction work information - Live disruption information - Comprehensive station list (not stored locally)  NOTES: - All information is provided by the Dutch railway system - No data is stored locally except your preferences settings - The app requires an internet connection - As this is a BETA app, I expect some glitches. Please provide feedback with as much detail as you can when comming across issues
